Name: Ginger Snap
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.
Review: This balanced Gin Collins is sweetened by ginger and orange liqueurs.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2007 by Gary "gaz" Regan , New York, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Ginger Snap contains 171 calories
